item.title: Some Thoughts on ChatGPT
item.description: Note that some of this article was written with some assitance with ChatGPT, paragraphs drafted using the tool are preceded with the prompt used to generate the content, and marked as such at the end, although there may have been edits or revisions applied by the author. Working in the education technology space in the advent of ChatGPT has been interesting if not also irritating. Like any other bubble, people tend to take a lot of stock in new technology that seems to be easy to use and disrupt how our society operates.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Introduction I’m Tom, I’m 30 years old, and I work as a Data Engineer at Unizin. Stay tuned for more posts on tech, philosophy, economics, and whatever else I feel like writing about.
